bill_title: require that certain state vehicles be equipped as flexible fuel vehicles.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require that certain state vehicles be equipped as flexible fuel vehicles. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Any gasoline-powered motor vehicle that is purchased or leased by the state after July 1, 2002, shall be equipped as a flexible fuel vehicle, also known as an FFV, if the cost of the FFV is less than or equal to the cost of a conventional gasoline powered vehicle and if the FFV otherwise meets the same specifications as the state requires for conventional gasoline powered vehicles. For purposes of this section, the term, flexible fuel vehicle or FFV, means a vehicle that is capable of using a variety of ethanol blend motor fuels, including E85 as defined in § 10-47B- 3. 450 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.021 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
